underlying_goal: To expand a placeholder note in an application into a nuanced paragraph about AI limitations.
primary_success: Successfully incorporating the user's nuanced feedback that long-horizon incoherence is both a safety feature and an eroding limitation.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to expand on a note about AI limitations. After Claude's initial draft, the user provided a nuanced critique, which Claude then successfully integrated into a more sophisticated final paragraph discussing the tradeoffs of long-horizon coherence in AI.
